column4: What is the Linux Terminal command to see the current wireless chipset?
it should be listed there and dmesg
does neither list a network controller
are you sure the network manager hasnt picked up the network card already
do you know what wireless card you have ?
did u try the link i sent you
do you have the network manager icon near the clock
does it show a wireless card ?
does your laptop have a function key which turns the wireless on and off
what make n model laptop is it ?
go to this link http://support.gateway.com/support/default.asp enter your serial number, hopefully it will tell you your network card type
we can do it step by step if u like
